text: 16.24: Ais 66.24; Sek 14.12; Mk 9.44Mba ŋkɨɨa kɨvgi guma Abraham gangiap, mbaram ana kaav khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Fhe Abraham, ndu nan korar muuŋv nan kurkura saŋv Rasarus ga suaŋrim, ana won farafe ndi mbɨn rugɨp, zɨv na ze darim, na ze thaneŋ raŋgirga. Gu kha vhava bakɨmen kav guigira zaa mbatɨga ndi.’
